select so.*, c.name as buyerName, c.email as buyerEmail, c.tel as buyerTel, c.address as buyerAddress from shopOrder so, customer c where c.mid = so.mid and so.idx = #{idx}
select * from shop where mid = #{mid} and claim = 'YES';
mapper.update: update partner set userDel = 'YES', level = 99 where mid = #{mid};
